thoughts.text: The web search has returned several resources on best practices for gathering website requirements. I should now analyze this information to understand the best approach to gather the necessary information for the website development.
thoughts.reasoning: Analyzing these resources will provide me with the necessary knowledge and techniques to effectively gather the website requirements.
thoughts.plan:
- Analyze the resources on best practices for gathering website requirements
- Apply the learned techniques to gather the necessary information for the website development
thoughts.criticism: I have not started gathering the website requirements yet. I need to analyze the resources and start the requirements gathering process.
thoughts.speak: I am analyzing some resources on best practices for gathering website requirements. This will help me to effectively gather the necessary information for the website development.
